name: Inner Mind
description:
Inner Mind is a short game about a schizophrenic person who experiences reality in a disturbing way. It's a first-person graphic adventure game, in which the player must guide the protagonist through his psychosis by solving puzzle tasks while being guided by personalities created by his own mind. This game takes place in a reality in which physics might work in a different way from our world.

This game was developed by:

Pedro Marques - https://pmarques93.itch.io/
Gabriel Santos - https://jundmaster.itch.io/
Gonçalo Vila Verde - https://mrv3rdinsky.itch.io/
